titles.title: To amend the National Capital Revitalization and Self-Government Improvement Act of 1997 to repeal a specific criminal penalty on a person in the District of Columbia for obstructing a bridge between the District of Columbia and the Commonwealth of Virginia.
District of Columbia Home Rule Bridges Act
District of Columbia Home Rule Bridges Act
District of Columbia Home Rule Bridges Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
District of Columbia Home Rule Bridges Act
This bill repeals a law that makes it a crime for a person in the District of Columbia to knowingly and willfully obstruct any bridge connecting the District and Virginia.
